hero.name: Patrick Patenaude
hero.title: Web & Mobile Developer
hero.subtitle: Self-driven, detail-oriented, and passionate about modern technologies and user experience.

about.title: About
about.bio: First degree in psychology, second in computer science. I discovered programming during the pandemic and never looked back. I care as much about understanding users as writing solid code — even if computers are easier to debug than humans.

halterofit.name: Halterofit
halterofit.description: Mobile workout tracking application. Fast logging, 1300+ exercise library, works offline with cloud sync.

blundermate.name: BlunderMate
blundermate.description: Chess engine in Prolog with ASCII terminal interface. Position evaluation, legal move generation and minimax search.

portfolio.name: Portfolio
portfolio.description: This website — built with React, Vite and Tailwind CSS. Bilingual, responsive, with subtle animations.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: Interested in my profile? Feel free to reach out.

footer.made_with: Built with React, Vite & Tailwind CSS
